Html:
Good evening,
I'm having trouble just getting started with the new version 5.0.0.1 portable libraries. First I create an empty solution, then I add a new Portable Class Library that targets Windows Phone 8.1, Xamarin.Android and Xamarin.iOS. From there I use nuget to add the MVVMLight package. Nuget will then add the ViewModel folder, MainViewModel & ViewModelLocator. However it does NOT update the references and I get an error stating "Cannot find App.xaml in this project, no other changes made.". Since the references are not updated, I am unable to build this simple library. Any guidance on this issue would be appreciated. THanks!

Hi,

For a portable class library, please use the package "MVVM Light Libs only" found at http://www.nuget.org/packages/MvvmLightLibs/

The other package is only for applications.

I will update the error message to make this clearer.

Thanks
Laurent

FYI there seems to be an issue with Nuget not adding the proper reference to CommonServiceLocator.

Sorry for the issue. Right now, I need you to use Nuget to add a reference to the CommonServiceLocator package (V1.3) in addition to MVVM Light Libs only.

I sent an email to the Nuget team to see what the problem is.

Thanks
Laurent

The issue should be fixed in V5.0.1 available on Nuget now.

Cheers
Laurent
